title: Toxic Mercury Good for Children?
cleaned_text:
The government and top medical associations continue to claim that mercury-containing vaccinations are safe in spite of medical evidence and scientific evidence to the contrary. It is an incontestable fact that mercury is a highly toxic substance, which has been widely suspected of causing autism from childhood vaccinations that use mercury. The following news report is bizarre . . .

In sharp contrast, New York's Rockland County Department of Health has this to say about the dangers of Mercury . . .

Is mercury harmful to my health? 

 Mercury can cause permanent damage to the brain and central nervous system. It can also affect other vital organs such as the kidneys, lungs, and skin. Exposure to mercury is especially dangerous to pregnant women and children.

There no debate over the hazards of mercury. It's hard to believe that anyone would actually say mercury is good for children. Yeah right! Ask these parents about mercury in vaccinations. . .
